CustomField.description: Report column name that holds unique record values for sorting and paginating. Needed for workaround with Reports API to process more than 2,000 rows. Applicable when Source Type is Report.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Choose a column that uniquely identifies each record in the report. For example, "Account ID". Uniqueness ensures predictable sorting and pagination to avoid processing a record multiple times.
CustomField.label: Source Report Column Name
